1.15.text: I was very vain and didn't want a hearing aid,

4.76.text: you see them stuck in people's ears or

7.80.text:
these things hanging over, and I really
didn't want that look.

12.20.text: But when it got so bad that

15.22.text: my children didn't want to call me on the phone anymore

18.82.text: and I couldn't hear when I went out with my friends,

21.08.text: I decided that I had to swallow my self-pride and just see what they had.

27.26.text:
I wanted something that could be
camouflaged a little bit

32.30.text:
so it wasn't so noticeable, but I also
wanted to be able to hear.

36.84.text:
One thing that I really like about these
hearing aids is that you can't see them.

42.52.text: Nobody has ever noticed them and that's what I really like about them -

47.08.text: - one of the things I really like about them.
